content.raw: I’d expect the page to describe the minimum system requirements for running the simulation \(including the minimum system and gpu memory required\). Will it run ok on 650? If someone comes it and says it does not work on 650, will it be fixed? If so, then I’d in deed feel much better if 650 was there. But I don’t think this is about my feelings.
